nodes.text: A Hardsuit was a type of archaic space suit that allowed a spacer to leave their spacecraft. Several were kept aboard the YT-2400 light freighter Junker and in about 41 ABY, the Jedi Knight Jaden Korr used a hardsuit to exit the Junker, as part of an arrangement that he made with the Umbaran Sith agent Nyss Nenn to hand himself over in return for the release of Korr's friend Khedryn Faal, who had been captured by Nenn.
